sentences.en: A smaller vehicle will consume less fuel.
Alcohol may not be consumed on the premises.
Bacteria in stagnant bowel consume dietery vitamin B 12.
sentences.cn: 滞留在肠道的内细菌还消耗食物中的维生素B12.

sentences.en: Britons still consume more than 29 million pints a day, ranging over 1,000 or more different brews.
sentences.cn: 英国人每天仍然要喝掉2,900多万品脱、1,000多种不同牌子的啤酒。

sentences.en: Classically, overweight people underestimate the volume of food that they consume.
sentences.cn: 一般来说，超重的人往往低估自己摄入食物的量。

sentences.en: Do you think we'll help start a war that will consume the planet?
sentences.cn: 你认为我们会帮你引发战争去毁灭世界 吗 ?

sentences.en: Earthworms consume large amounts of soil, and produce a rich humus, perfect in texture.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓吃下大量土壤，排出肥力丰富、物理结构理想的腐殖质。

sentences.en: He must subdue her, absorb her, rip her apart and consume her.
sentences.cn: 他立意要征服她, 吞了她, 不惜把她撕碎把她榨干.

sentences.en: Many people are unaware of just how much food and drink they consume.
sentences.cn: 许多人并不知道他们究竟消耗掉了多少食品和饮料。

sentences.en: Only 27% of the paper we consume is recycled.
sentences.cn: 我们消耗的纸张只有 27% 得到回收利用。

sentences.en: Some animals may consume insignificant amounts of the primary production.
sentences.cn: 有些动物可以消耗很微量的初级产物.

sentences.en: Some of the most efficient refrigerators consume 70 percent less electricity than traditional models.
sentences.cn: 一些极为节能的冰箱比传统型号耗电减少70%。

sentences.en: The bacteria in the stagnant bowel consume dietary vitamin B 12.
sentences.cn: 肠道内的细菌消耗食物中的维生素B12.

sentences.en: The fact of the matter is that most people consume far more protein than they actually need.
sentences.cn: 真实的情况是，大多数人摄入的蛋白质比他们实际所需的多出许多。

sentences.en: The march would consume half of the useful life of the vehicle.
sentences.cn: 此次长途跋涉将过于损耗车辆的寿命.

sentences.en: The world is beginning to consume its capital along with the interest.
sentences.cn: 世界不仅在消耗利息,也正在消耗本金.

sentences.en: Thermal engines , be they large or small, have to consume fuel.
sentences.cn: 热机不论大小都需要消耗燃料.

sentences.en: They generally consume more power and take up more space, too.
sentences.cn: 它们通常消耗更多的能量,并且占用更多的空间.

words.tran_cn: 消耗性的；浪费的；肺病的
保护消费者利益运动；用户至上主义
消耗（consume的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 消耗，吞噬，充满（感情），吃喝，烧毁
trans.tran_en: to use time, energy, goods etc
To consume an amount of fuel, energy, or time means to use it up
to use time, energy, goods etc
